name: Corrupted Choice
description:
You found yourself in the middle of the forest. Something tells you to go further and become more powerful, but some part of you tell to go back. So, where would you like to go, will you listen yourself or a strange voice in your head? It's time to make a choice.

This game currently in early development, so there is small amount of content, and bugs.

Vk group(Russian) - https://vk.com/public204813087
